resources.string: 1) What creature is depicted in the emblem for Gryffindor house?
2) Among the wizarding community, the term "Muggle" refers to what kind of person?
A non magical person from magical family
A magical person who is really bad at magic
A non magical person from non-magical family
A magical person with only one magical parent
3) What is the name of the Hogwarts principal?
4) Members of Ravenclaw house are known for possessing which two of the following traits?
5) What is the incantation for the Summoning Charm?
6) What colour is the Hogwarts Express?
7) How are parcels and letters sent in the wizarding world?
8) What do Harry and Ron crash into when they fly Arthur Weasley\'s Ford Anglia to Hogwarts?
\u0020Probably magic is not for you, and you are what would be called a true Muggle.
\u0020For me you are a hateful kid who considers himself above the rules.
\u0020The truth is a wonderful and terrible thing, and for this it must be treated with great caution.
In question 1 you have to check at least 1 option
In question 2 you have to check at least 1 option
In question 3 you have to write an answer
In question 4 you have to check at least 1 option
In question 5 you have to check at least 1 option
In question 6 you have to check at least 1 option
In question 7 you have to write an answer
In question 8 you have to check at least 1 option
